roleset.name: to have a deceptive appearance
roleset.note: MASQUERADE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'masquerade' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from masquerade.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: gerund
example.text: This follows earlier new guidelines from the Tax Division prohibiting [Princeton\/Newport-like tax cases]-1 from [*]-1 masquerading as RICO cases .
